Three veteran observers of Iranian naval forces and doctrines assess the country's ability to punch above its weight in the Persian Gulf.

Experts On Iran

Trusted Expertise Link: #

The Washington Institute offers unparalleled insights into all aspects of the Middle East and U.S. policy in the region.

Barbara A. Leaf Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts/view/barbara-leaf

Ambassador Barbara A. Leaf is the Ruth and Sid Lapidus Fellow at The Washington Institute and director of the Geduld Program on Arab Politics.

Katherine Bauer Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts/view/katherine-bauer

Katherine Bauer is the Blumenstein-Katz Family fellow at The Washington Institute and a former official at the U.S. Treasury Department.

Michael Eisenstadt Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts/view/eisenstadt-michael

Michael Eisenstadt is the David Kahn and Douglas Kahn Fellow and director of The Washington Institute's Military and Security Studies Program.

Mehdi Khalaji Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts/view/khalaji-mehdi

Mehdi Khalaji, a Qom-trained Shiite theologian, is the Libitzky Family Fellow at The Washington Institute.

Patrick Clawson Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts/view/clawson-patrick

Patrick Clawson is Morningstar senior fellow and director of research at the Washington Institute for Near East Policy.

Michael Singh Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts/view/singh-michael

Michael Singh is the Lane-Swig Senior Fellow and managing director at The Washington Institute.

Dennis Ross Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts/view/ross-dennis

Dennis Ross, a former special assistant to President Barack Obama, is the counselor and William Davidson Distinguished Fellow at The Washington Institute.

See All Experts Link: https://www.washingtoninstitute.org/experts
